name: A Tale Between Two Worlds
description:
A tale between two worlds is a journey of Yukio, a kid discovering the power of the imagination and how to fight against fears and darkness of heart looking for one more meet with the one beloved who is not longer there.

Explore what's between real world and imagination, the strongest weapon we got as kids. 

Characters

Yukio

Is and introvert kid who loves art and videogames. Talented but clouded by his fears and insecurities.  Inside him lies a very powerful feeling capable to do incredible things. 

Vic

Energetic kid who impulses Yukio to take risks and be more expresive. Maybe the only one who can help Yukio in his journey.

  Gameplay

Get into narrative  this world shows and face  battles   where your strategy will be crucial. 

Dynamic battles with quick button system that determines the generated and received damaged. 

Enemies buff or debuff depending element respecting weather. 

Explore the city.

Manage skills and resources

Upgrade and unlock abilities. 

Purchase and manage equipment.
